metadata.Readme:
Sitecore E-Commerce DIBS Payment Services ${product.version.dibs} ------------------------------------------------------------- Date: ${readme.date}
------------------------------------------------------------- Prerequisites:
• ${project.fullname.multiple}.
------------------------------------------------------------- Post installation steps:
• Copy the payment options that you need from "/sitecore/system/Modules/Ecommerce/Payment Options" to Webshop Business Settings/Payment Options. • Configure the payment system credentials and settings. • Publish the content • Register the payment system alias in Unity.config: <alias alias="DibsPaymentProvider" type="Sitecore.Ecommerce.Payments.Dibs.DibsPaymentProvider, Sitecore.Ecommerce.Payments.Dibs"/> • Register the payment system in the container section of Unity.config: <register type="PaymentProvider" mapTo="DibsPaymentProvider" name="DIBS"> <property name="PaymentSystem" /> </register>
By default the payment system is configured to work as reservable payment provider.
If you want to make the transaction be captured immediately, add the "capturenow" setting: <setting id="capturenow">any value</setting>
If this field exists and contains any value, an "instant capture" is carried out, i.e. the amount is immediately transferred from the customer’s account to the shop’s account.
http://tech.dibs.dk/10_step_guide/select_method_of_capture/ http://tech.dibs.dk/integration_methods/flexwin/parameters/
NOTE: You should contact DIBS when using this function. (Please, also note that instant capture requires unique order numbers).
We strongly recommend setting the FlexWin option "Skip accept page" (Integration -> FlexWin) to prevent customers from closing the browser window before they have completed the checkout process.
http://tech.dibspayment.com/integration_methods/flexwin/flexwin_settings/
For more information about payment options, see the Payment Method Reference Guide.
